Game.Name: Lode Runner for WonderSwan (Japan)
Game.plot: Lode Runner for WonderSwan is a 2D Platformer game, developed and published by Banpresto, which was released in Japan in 2000.http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/wswan/home/577323.html
Game.Notes: Lode Runner for WonderSwan is an Action game, developed by Aisystem Tokyo and published by Banpresto, which was released in Japan in 2000.
